title: LF TOP & ADC for Competitive Tournaments Gold+
body:
Hello everyone, we are recruiting a TOP and ADC for our competitive team entering into amateur series tournaments. If you are interested in trying out please fill out this form. I will add you upon completion of the form. Thank you for your interest, we look forward to playing with you.

Age:
IGN:
Position:
Rank:
Champ Pool (rate your champs 1-5, 5 being the best):
Timezone:
Availability:

Timezone: est
Availability: most days at night
